system.notes: Requires two or more generators, activated or deactivated as a Full Action, which also activates any linked generators. Generates a wall of force 1.5m high and up to 8m long between them that acts as cover. If a Wall Section Overloads, only the section between two generators shuts down, the rest are unaffected.
